text: Unplugged is a 1992 live album by Eric Clapton and was recorded at Bray Studios, England as part of MTV Unplugged television series. It was released on 25 August, 1992 through Reprise Records. It topped the album charts in the United States, Australia, New Zealand, the Netherlands, Denmark, Canada and Japan and made number 2 in the United Kingdom, Portugal, Spain and Finland. It won 6 Grammys in 1993. ==Track listing== Notes: *signifies arranged by ==References== Category:1992 albums Category:Eric Clapton albums Category:Reprise Records albums
title: Unplugged (Eric Clapton album)
